description:
Gladiator representing Village of Dawn.
Master of Burmese martial arts "Lethwei" who howls at the top of his lungs and doesn`t defend himself against his opponent`s blows. At 16, he lost a decision on points to Kaolan Wongsawat and has considered him his ultimate rival ever since. He hounds him day and night for a rematch.
Source: Official site
name: Yoroizuka Saw Paing
